scripts.AdminUI: cd secure-eye-admin && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.SecureEye: cd secure-eye-ui && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.Backend: cd secure-eye-Backend && npm install && tsc -b && node dist/index.js
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run AdminUI" "npm run SecureEye" "npm run Backend"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd secure-eye-Database && npx prisma migrate dev
